name: disentangle
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to separate things that have become joined or confused: disentangle something from something It's difficult to disentangle hard fact from myth, or truth from lies. I tried to disentangle the wires under my desk. Synonym
extricate formal

to separate things that have become joined or confused: It’s hard to disentangle the truth from all her lies.
